summary: The document is an identification form related to the JFK Assassination System, detailing an interview with Robert Scheer on October 5, 1966, at the Armed Forces Examining and Entrance Station in Oakland, California. Scheer requested counsel before discussing qualification forms DD 98 and 398 and submitted documents on US policies. The document is unclassified but released with deletions.
key_findings: The document is connected to the JFK Assassination System and investigates Robert Scheer.
In 1966, Scheer was interviewed about qualification forms and US policies.
Although unclassified, the document has been released with some information redacted.
The interview took place at the Armed Forces Examining and Entrance Station in Oakland, California.
keywords: Armed Forces Examining and Entrance Station
